|ConceptDef.label=Cover and shooting
|ConceptDef.label.zh-cn=掩体与射击
|ConceptDef.label.zh-tw=開火及掩護
|ConceptDef.priority=13
|ConceptDef.helpText=The most important thing to do in ranged combat is to use cover.<br/><br/>Cover only works if your colonist is touching it, and it is between your colonist and the enemy.<br/><br/>You can also place colonists behind wall corners. They will lean out to shoot.<br/><br/>Most things can be used as cover, but some things are better than others. Hiding behind a tree is better than nothing, but hiding behind sandbags is better than using a tree.
|ConceptDef.helpText.zh-cn=远程作战第一课：先给自己找掩体。<br/><br/>掩体只有在处于交火路径当中且你的殖民者紧贴着掩体时才生效。<br/><br/>你也可以把殖民者放在墙角后来射击。他们会侧身射击。<br/><br/>大部分物体都可以作为掩体，但是它们的效果并不尽相同，一棵树比没有掩体要强，但是远不如沙袋好使。
|ConceptDef.helpText.zh-tw=遠距離交火中，掩體是生死關鍵。<br/><br/>掩體必須位在火網之中且緊鄰居民時才有效。<br/><br/>牆角也能作為掩體。<br/><br/>大多物物體都能當作掩體，但效果不一，有棵樹總比什麼都沒有好，但效果遠不及沙包。
}}
